requests.name: Get a list of conversations
requests.description: The API returns the list of conversations the app has access to Authentication required, with scope participate:conversation

queryParams.description: Include private conversations into response. Default to 'true'.
A maximum number of conversations to return per call. Valid length range: 1 - 75. Default value is 75.
A string containing full or part of conversation's name. May be empty.
The cursor is a string, that you can use to scroll through the data set to get more results.
A sort order of the conversations lists. Supported values: asc or desc.
Exclude direct messages from a response. Default to 'false'

requests.name: Get conversation history
requests.description: Authentication required, with scope participate:conversation This method returns messages after/before a given messageIDs or/and timestamps. If these parameters are omitted the method returns conversation’s latest messages. Max number of messages returned is 75.

queryParams.description: Returns at most 75 messages before a provided messageID
Returns at most 75 messages before a provided RFC3339 timestamp (2006-01-02T15:04:05+07:00)
Returns at most 75 latest messages after a provided messageID
Returns at most 75 latest messages after a provided RFC3339 timestamp (2006-01-02T15:04:05+07:00)
A maximum number of conversations to return per call. Valid length range: 1 - 75. Default value is 75.

requests.name: Send a message to a conversation
requests.description: Send a message to a conversation.

requests.name: Get latest messages for conversation
requests.description: Authentication required, with scope participate:conversation Max number of messages returned is 75.

queryParams.description: A maximum number of conversations to return per call. Valid length range: 1 - 75. Default value is 75.

requests.name: Edit a message in a conversation
Delete a message in a conversation
Get conversation history contextually
requests.description: Authentication required, with scope participate:conversation This method returns messages after and/or before a given messageID including the message itself. Default value for 'after' and 'before' query parameters is 0. Max number of messages returned is 75.

queryParams.description: A number of messages to return before the Message.
A number of messages to return after the Message.
